name: Hadoop Cube Bottom Up Computation
body:
BUC
===
In this project, I implemented BUC algorithm - an efficient way for aggregating **Ice-berg-CUBE** problem - in the paper **Bottom-Up Computation of Sparse and Iceberg CUBEs** of *Kevin Beyer and Raghu Ramakrishnan in Proceedings* of the *5th ACM international workshop on Data Warehousing and OLAP, DOLAP â€™02*
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
